\begin{document}
\maketitle

\section{Introduction}\label{introduction}

To undertake segmented regression (one and two-break models) for
Scotland, all-ages, age-standardised mortality rates(ASMR). Employs full
data range available (Q1 1990-Q2 2018). Quarterly annual ASMR employ the
2013 European Standard Popualtion, and were provided by National Records
for Scotland.

Contents:

\begin{itemize}
\tightlist
\item
  Load packages, load data, tidy data labels, and convert dates to
  identifiable quarters
\item
  Plot observed data
\item
  Generate, view and plot linear model
\item
  Run Davies test to identify and test signifcance of single break point
\item
  Generate and view one breakpoint segmented model
\item
  Extract breakpoints and confidence intervals
\item
  Plot one breakpoint model
\item
  Generate two break segmented model
\item
  Use AIC and BIC to compare fit of one and two break models
\item
  Plot two breakpoint model
\end{itemize}

\NormalTok{  dplyr,}
\NormalTok{  readr,}
\NormalTok{  ggplot2,}
\NormalTok{  broom,}
\NormalTok{  tidyr}
\NormalTok{               )}
\end{Highlighting}
\end{Shaded}

\section{Tidy periods into quarters, select all age rate, filter to M\&F
only}\label{tidy-periods-into-quarters-select-all-age-rate-filter-to-mf-only}

\begin{Shaded}
\begin{Highlighting}[]
\NormalTok{tidied_allagerates_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}
\StringTok{  }\NormalTok{data }\OperatorTok{%>%}
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{separate}\NormalTok{(period, }\DataTypeTok{into =} \KeywordTok{c}\NormalTok{(}\StringTok{"year"}\NormalTok{,}\StringTok{"quarter"}\NormalTok{), }\DataTypeTok{sep =} \DecValTok{4}\NormalTok{) }\OperatorTok{%>%}\StringTok{ }
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{mutate}\NormalTok{(}
   \DataTypeTok{year =} \KeywordTok{as.double}\NormalTok{(year),}
   \DataTypeTok{quarter =} \KeywordTok{as.double}\NormalTok{(quarter)}
\NormalTok{  ) }\OperatorTok{%>%}\StringTok{ }
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{mutate}\NormalTok{(}
    \DataTypeTok{time =}\NormalTok{ year }\OperatorTok{+}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{(quarter }\OperatorTok{/}\StringTok{ }\DecValTok{4}\NormalTok{) }\OperatorTok{-}\StringTok{ }\FloatTok{0.125}
\NormalTok{  ) }\OperatorTok{%>%}\StringTok{ }
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{select}\NormalTok{(time, sex, allageesprate) }\OperatorTok{%>%}
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{filter}\NormalTok{(sex}\OperatorTok{!=}\StringTok{"P"}\NormalTok{)}
  

\NormalTok{tidied_allagerates_}\DecValTok{2018}
\end{Highlighting}
\end{Shaded}

\subsection{Extract breakpoint and CI of one break
model}\label{extract-breakpoint-and-ci-of-one-break-model}

\begin{Shaded}
\begin{Highlighting}[]
\NormalTok{breakpointmale_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{my.seg_male_}\DecValTok{2018}\OperatorTok{$}\NormalTok{psi[, }\DecValTok{2}\NormalTok{]}
\NormalTok{breakpointfemale_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{my.seg_female_}\DecValTok{2018}\OperatorTok{$}\NormalTok{psi[, }\DecValTok{2}\NormalTok{]}
\NormalTok{breakpoint_SEmale_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{my.seg_male_}\DecValTok{2018}\OperatorTok{$}\NormalTok{psi[, }\DecValTok{3}\NormalTok{]}
\NormalTok{breakpoint_SEfemale_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{my.seg_female_}\DecValTok{2018}\OperatorTok{$}\NormalTok{psi[, }\DecValTok{3}\NormalTok{]}
\NormalTok{breakpoint_low_CImale_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{breakpointmale_}\DecValTok{2018} \OperatorTok{-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{(breakpoint_SEmale_}\DecValTok{2018}\OperatorTok{*}\FloatTok{1.96}\NormalTok{)}
\NormalTok{breakpoint_up_CImale_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{breakpointmale_}\DecValTok{2018} \OperatorTok{+}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{(breakpoint_SEmale_}\DecValTok{2018}\OperatorTok{*}\FloatTok{1.96}\NormalTok{)}
\NormalTok{breakpoint_low_CIfemale_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{breakpointfemale_}\DecValTok{2018} \OperatorTok{-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{(breakpoint_SEfemale_}\DecValTok{2018}\OperatorTok{*}\FloatTok{1.96}\NormalTok{)}
\NormalTok{breakpoint_up_CIfemale_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{breakpointfemale_}\DecValTok{2018} \OperatorTok{+}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{(breakpoint_SEfemale_}\DecValTok{2018}\OperatorTok{*}\FloatTok{1.96}\NormalTok{)}

\subsection{Generate and plot predicted values from one break

\begin{Shaded}
\begin{Highlighting}[]

\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{filter}\NormalTok{(sex }\OperatorTok{==}\StringTok{ "M"}\NormalTok{) }\OperatorTok{%>%}\StringTok{ }

\NormalTok{      )}
\NormalTok{    ) ->}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{malefitted_}\DecValTok{2018}

\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{filter}\NormalTok{(sex }\OperatorTok{==}\StringTok{ "F"}\NormalTok{) }\OperatorTok{%>%}\StringTok{ }
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{mutate}\NormalTok{(}
    \DataTypeTok{onebreak_fit =} \KeywordTok{fitted}\NormalTok{(}

\NormalTok{      )}

\subsection{Annotated plot of observed data, segmented model, and
continutation of pre-breakpoint
trend}\label{annotated-plot-of-observed-data-segmented-model-and-continutation-of-pre-breakpoint-trend}

\begin{Shaded}
\begin{Highlighting}[]
 \CommentTok{# Get coeffiencents male}
\NormalTok{  b0_aspec_m_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\KeywordTok{coef}\NormalTok{(my.seg_male_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{)[[}\DecValTok{1}\NormalTok{]]}
\NormalTok{  b1_aspec_m_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\KeywordTok{coef}\NormalTok{(my.seg_male_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{)[[}\DecValTok{2}\NormalTok{]]}
\NormalTok{  c1_aspec_m_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\KeywordTok{coef}\NormalTok{(my.seg_male_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{)[[}\DecValTok{2}\NormalTok{]] }\OperatorTok{+}\StringTok{ }\KeywordTok{coef}\NormalTok{(my.seg_male_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{)[[}\DecValTok{3}\NormalTok{]]}
  
\NormalTok{  break1_aspec_m_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{my.seg_male_}\DecValTok{2018}\OperatorTok{$}\NormalTok{psi[[}\DecValTok{2}\NormalTok{]]}
  
  \CommentTok{# Get coefficients female}
\NormalTok{    b0_aspec_f_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\KeywordTok{coef}\NormalTok{(my.seg_female_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{)[[}\DecValTok{1}\NormalTok{]]}
\NormalTok{  b1_aspec_f_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\KeywordTok{coef}\NormalTok{(my.seg_female_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{)[[}\DecValTok{2}\NormalTok{]]}
\NormalTok{  c1_aspec_f_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\KeywordTok{coef}\NormalTok{(my.seg_female_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{)[[}\DecValTok{2}\NormalTok{]] }\OperatorTok{+}\StringTok{ }\KeywordTok{coef}\NormalTok{(my.seg_female_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{)[[}\DecValTok{3}\NormalTok{]]}
  
\NormalTok{  break1_aspec_f <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{my.seg_female_}\DecValTok{2018}\OperatorTok{$}\NormalTok{psi[[}\DecValTok{2}\NormalTok{]]}
  
\CommentTok{# plot}
\NormalTok{ p <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{obs_fit_both_}\DecValTok{2018} \OperatorTok{%>%}\StringTok{ }
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{ggplot}\NormalTok{(}
    \KeywordTok{aes}\NormalTok{ (}\DataTypeTok{x=}\NormalTok{time, }\DataTypeTok{color=}\NormalTok{sex)}
\NormalTok{  ) }\OperatorTok{+}
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{geom_point}\NormalTok{(}
    \KeywordTok{aes}\NormalTok{ (}\DataTypeTok{y=}\NormalTok{observed), }\DataTypeTok{alpha=}\FloatTok{0.4}\NormalTok{) }\OperatorTok{+}
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{geom_line}\NormalTok{ (}
    \KeywordTok{aes}\NormalTok{ (}\DataTypeTok{y=}\NormalTok{predicted), }\DataTypeTok{size=}\DecValTok{1}\NormalTok{) }\OperatorTok{+}
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{geom_abline}\NormalTok{(}\DataTypeTok{intercept =}\NormalTok{ b0_aspec_m_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{, }\DataTypeTok{slope =}\NormalTok{ b1_aspec_m_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{, }\DataTypeTok{color=}\StringTok{"#00BFC4"}\NormalTok{, }\DataTypeTok{linetype=}\StringTok{"dashed"}\NormalTok{) }\OperatorTok{+}
\StringTok{    }\KeywordTok{geom_abline}\NormalTok{(}\DataTypeTok{intercept =}\NormalTok{ b0_aspec_f_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{, }\DataTypeTok{slope =}\NormalTok{ b1_aspec_f_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{, }\DataTypeTok{color=}\StringTok{"#F8766D"}\NormalTok{, }\DataTypeTok{linetype=} \StringTok{"dashed"}\NormalTok{) }\OperatorTok{+}
\StringTok{    }\KeywordTok{ylim}\NormalTok{(}\DecValTok{0}\NormalTok{,}\DecValTok{2200}\NormalTok{)}\OperatorTok{+}
\StringTok{    }\KeywordTok{labs}\NormalTok{(}\DataTypeTok{x=}\StringTok{"Year"}\NormalTok{, }\DataTypeTok{y=}\StringTok{"Age-standardised mortality rate"}\NormalTok{, }\DataTypeTok{title =} 
        \StringTok{"Age-standardised quarterly rolling annual mortality rates }
\StringTok{         and fitted segmented model, males and females, all ages, }
\StringTok{         Scotland, 1990 to 2017"}\NormalTok{) }\OperatorTok{+}
\StringTok{    }\KeywordTok{scale_x_continuous}\NormalTok{ (}\DataTypeTok{breaks=}\KeywordTok{c}\NormalTok{(}\DecValTok{1990}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{1994}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{1998}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{2002}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{2006}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{2010}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{2014}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{))}\OperatorTok{+}

\subsection{Combine male and female observed and predicted - 2
break}\label{combine-male-and-female-observed-and-predicted---2-break}

\begin{Shaded}
\begin{Highlighting}[]
\NormalTok{femalefitted2_}\DecValTok{2018} \OperatorTok{%>%}\StringTok{ }
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{select}\NormalTok{(}
\NormalTok{    time, sex, }\DataTypeTok{observed =}\NormalTok{ allageesprate,}
    \DataTypeTok{predicted =}\NormalTok{ twobreak_fit}
\NormalTok{  ) }\OperatorTok{%>%}\StringTok{ }

\NormalTok{    malefitted2_}\DecValTok{2018} \OperatorTok{%>%}\StringTok{ }
\StringTok{      }\KeywordTok{select}\NormalTok{(}
\NormalTok{        time, sex, }\DataTypeTok{observed =}\NormalTok{ allageesprate,}
        \DataTypeTok{predicted =}\NormalTok{ twobreak_fit}
\NormalTok{      ) }
\NormalTok{  ) ->}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{obs_fit_both_2018_2break}

\section{Extract breakpoint and CI for 2 break
model}\label{extract-breakpoint-and-ci-for-2-break-model}

\begin{Shaded}
\begin{Highlighting}[]
\NormalTok{breakpointmale_2018_2break <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{my.seg_male2_}\DecValTok{2018}\OperatorTok{$}\NormalTok{psi[, }\DecValTok{2}\NormalTok{]}
\NormalTok{breakpointfemale_2018_2break <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{my.seg_female2_}\DecValTok{2018}\OperatorTok{$}\NormalTok{psi[, }\DecValTok{2}\NormalTok{]}
\NormalTok{breakpoint_SEmale_2018_2break <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{my.seg_male2_}\DecValTok{2018}\OperatorTok{$}\NormalTok{psi[, }\DecValTok{3}\NormalTok{]}
\NormalTok{breakpoint_SEfemale_2018_2break <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{my.seg_female2_}\DecValTok{2018}\OperatorTok{$}\NormalTok{psi[, }\DecValTok{3}\NormalTok{]}
\NormalTok{breakpoint_low_CImale_2018_2break <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{breakpointmale_2018_2break }\OperatorTok{-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{(breakpoint_SEmale_2018_2break}\OperatorTok{*}\FloatTok{1.96}\NormalTok{)}
\NormalTok{breakpoint_up_CImale_2018_2break <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{breakpointmale_2018_2break }\OperatorTok{+}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{(breakpoint_SEmale_2018_2break}\OperatorTok{*}\FloatTok{1.96}\NormalTok{)}
\NormalTok{breakpoint_low_CIfemale_2018_2break <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{breakpointfemale_2018_2break }\OperatorTok{-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{(breakpoint_SEfemale_2018_2break}\OperatorTok{*}\FloatTok{1.96}\NormalTok{)}
\NormalTok{breakpoint_up_CIfemale_2018_2break <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{breakpointfemale_2018_2break }\OperatorTok{+}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{(breakpoint_SEfemale_2018_2break}\OperatorTok{*}\FloatTok{1.96}\NormalTok{)}

\NormalTok{breakpointmale_2018_2break}
\end{Highlighting}

\subsection{2 break segmented plot}\label{break-segmented-plot}

\begin{Shaded}
\begin{Highlighting}[]
\NormalTok{segmentedplot_allage2break <-}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{obs_fit_both_2018_2break }\OperatorTok{%>%}\StringTok{ }
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{ggplot}\NormalTok{(}
    \KeywordTok{aes}\NormalTok{ (}\DataTypeTok{x=}\NormalTok{time, }\DataTypeTok{color=}\NormalTok{sex)}
\NormalTok{  ) }\OperatorTok{+}
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{geom_point}\NormalTok{(}
    \KeywordTok{aes}\NormalTok{ (}\DataTypeTok{y=}\NormalTok{observed), }\DataTypeTok{alpha=}\FloatTok{0.4}\NormalTok{)}\OperatorTok{+}
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{geom_line}\NormalTok{ (}
    \KeywordTok{aes}\NormalTok{ (}\DataTypeTok{y=}\NormalTok{predicted), }\DataTypeTok{size=}\DecValTok{1}\NormalTok{) }\OperatorTok{+}
\StringTok{    }\KeywordTok{ylim}\NormalTok{(}\DecValTok{0}\NormalTok{,}\DecValTok{2500}\NormalTok{)}\OperatorTok{+}
\StringTok{    }\KeywordTok{labs}\NormalTok{(}\DataTypeTok{x=}\StringTok{"Year"}\NormalTok{, }\DataTypeTok{y=}\StringTok{"Age-standardised mortality rate"}\NormalTok{, }\DataTypeTok{title =} \StringTok{"Age-standardised quarterly rolling annual mortality rates"}\NormalTok{, }\DataTypeTok{subtitles=}\StringTok{"males and females, all ages, Scotland, 1990 to 2018: two-break segmented model fitted"}\NormalTok{)}\OperatorTok{+}
\StringTok{ }\KeywordTok{scale_x_continuous}\NormalTok{ (}\DataTypeTok{breaks=}\KeywordTok{c}\NormalTok{(}\DecValTok{1990}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{1994}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{1998}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{2002}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{2006}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{2010}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{2014}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{))}\OperatorTok{+}\StringTok{ }\CommentTok{# Could also do breaks = seq(from = 1990, 2018, by = 4)}
\StringTok{      }\KeywordTok{geom_vline}\NormalTok{(}\DataTypeTok{xintercept =}\NormalTok{ my.seg_male2_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{[[}\StringTok{"psi"}\NormalTok{]][[}\DecValTok{2}\NormalTok{]], }\DataTypeTok{color =} \StringTok{"#00BFC4"}\NormalTok{, }\DataTypeTok{linetype=}\StringTok{"dotdash"}\NormalTok{)}\OperatorTok{+}

\StringTok{   }\KeywordTok{annotate}\NormalTok{(}\DataTypeTok{geom=}\StringTok{"text"}\NormalTok{, }\DataTypeTok{x=}\DecValTok{2017}\NormalTok{, }\DataTypeTok{y=}\DecValTok{250}\NormalTok{, }\DataTypeTok{label=}\StringTok{"Female}\CharTok{\textbackslash{}n}\StringTok{breakpoint}\CharTok{\textbackslash{}n}\StringTok{July 2013-}\CharTok{\textbackslash{}n}\StringTok{June2014"}\NormalTok{)}

\section{errorbar plot}\label{errorbar-plot}

\begin{Shaded}
\begin{Highlighting}[]
\NormalTok{obs_fit_both_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{ <-}\StringTok{ }\KeywordTok{as_tibble}\NormalTok{(obs_fit_both_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{) }\CommentTok{# convert to 'nice' tibble format (better display)}

\NormalTok{temp_data <-}\StringTok{ }\KeywordTok{tribble}\NormalTok{(}
  \OperatorTok{~}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{sex, }\OperatorTok{~}\NormalTok{time_min, }\OperatorTok{~}\NormalTok{time_max, }\OperatorTok{~}\NormalTok{y_pos, }
  \StringTok{"M"}\NormalTok{, breakpointmale_}\DecValTok{2018} \OperatorTok{-}\StringTok{ }\DecValTok{2} \OperatorTok{*}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{breakpoint_SEmale_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{, breakpointmale_}\DecValTok{2018} \OperatorTok{+}\StringTok{ }\DecValTok{2} \OperatorTok{*}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{breakpoint_SEmale_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{1300}\NormalTok{,}
  \StringTok{"F"}\NormalTok{, breakpointfemale_}\DecValTok{2018} \OperatorTok{-}\StringTok{ }\DecValTok{2} \OperatorTok{*}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{breakpoint_SEfemale_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{, breakpointfemale_}\DecValTok{2018} \OperatorTok{+}\StringTok{ }\DecValTok{2} \OperatorTok{*}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{breakpoint_SEfemale_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{1000} 
\NormalTok{)}


\NormalTok{obs_fit_both_}\DecValTok{2018} \OperatorTok{%>%}\StringTok{ }
\StringTok{   }\KeywordTok{ggplot}\NormalTok{(}
     \KeywordTok{aes}\NormalTok{(}\DataTypeTok{x =}\NormalTok{ time, }\DataTypeTok{y =}\NormalTok{ observed, }\DataTypeTok{color =}\NormalTok{ sex, }\DataTypeTok{shape =}\NormalTok{ sex)}
\NormalTok{     ) }\OperatorTok{+}\StringTok{ }
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{geom_point}\NormalTok{(}\KeywordTok{aes}\NormalTok{(}\DataTypeTok{y=}\NormalTok{observed)) }\OperatorTok{+}
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{geom_errorbarh}\NormalTok{(}
    \KeywordTok{aes}\NormalTok{(}\DataTypeTok{xmin =}\NormalTok{ time_min, }\DataTypeTok{xmax =}\NormalTok{ time_max, }\DataTypeTok{y =}\NormalTok{ y_pos, }\DataTypeTok{colour =}\NormalTok{ sex),}
    \DataTypeTok{inherit.aes =}\NormalTok{ F, }
    \DataTypeTok{height =} \DecValTok{100}\NormalTok{,}
    \DataTypeTok{data =}\NormalTok{ temp_data}
\NormalTok{  ) }\OperatorTok{+}
\StringTok{  }\KeywordTok{geom_point}\NormalTok{(}
    \KeywordTok{aes}\NormalTok{(}\DataTypeTok{x =}\NormalTok{ brkpoint, }\DataTypeTok{y =}\NormalTok{ y_pos, }\DataTypeTok{shape =}\NormalTok{ sex, }\DataTypeTok{color =}\NormalTok{ sex),}
    \DataTypeTok{inherit.aes =}\NormalTok{ F,}
    \DataTypeTok{data =} \KeywordTok{tribble}\NormalTok{(}
      \OperatorTok{~}\StringTok{ }\NormalTok{sex, }\OperatorTok{~}\NormalTok{brkpoint, }\OperatorTok{~}\NormalTok{y_pos,}
      \StringTok{"M"}\NormalTok{, breakpointmale_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{1300}\NormalTok{,}
      \StringTok{"F"}\NormalTok{, breakpointfemale_}\DecValTok{2018}\NormalTok{, }\DecValTok{1000}
\NormalTok{    ),}
    \DataTypeTok{size =} \DecValTok{4}
\NormalTok{  )}
\end{Highlighting}
\end{Shaded}
